meanings.definition: A fortified Moorish palace or fortress in Spain.
meanings.sent1: The ancient alcazars stood proudly on the hilltops.
meanings.sent2: Tourists marveled at the intricate architecture of the alcazars.
meanings.sent3: The alcazars in Spain must have been a challenge to attack!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the walls of the alcazars, unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The alcazars loomed over the landscape like giants of stone.

meanings.definition: A large, luxurious house or mansion.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy businessman owned several alcazars in the city.
meanings.sent2: The alcazars along the coast were breathtaking with their ocean views.
meanings.sent3: Imagine having a pet elephant in your alcazars!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the alcazars like music.
meanings.sent5: The alcazars sparkled in the sunlight, a beacon of opulence.
